author: Damien Guichard
description: Damien Guichard says of his drink, "Amandita is inspired by a light French aperitif called a Mauresque, which traditionally combines orgeat, pastis and tap water. It represents the art of sharing a moment during a meal, between the giver and the receiver."
name: Amandita

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
